package_affected.distribution_affected: wheezy), these problems have been fixed in version 3.2.6-5+deb7u1. Debian provides two variants of <q>Ruby on Rails</q> in Wheezy (2.3 and 3.2
package_affected.fixed in: 3.2.6-5+deb7u1. Debian provides two variants of <q>Ruby on Rails</q> in Wheezy (2.3 and 3.2). Support for the 2.3 variants had to be ceased at this point. This affects the following source packages: ruby-actionmailer-2.3, ruby-actionpack-2.3, ruby-activerecord-2.3, ruby-activeresource-2.3, ruby-activesupport-2.3 and ruby-rails-2.3. The version of Redmine in Wheezy still requires 2.3, you can use an updated version from backports.debian.org which is compatible with rails 3.2
